Package net.silthus.schat.channel

Class ChannelSettings

java.lang.Object
net.silthus.schat.channel.ChannelSettings
public final class ChannelSettings extends Object
Holds references to all common settings of a Channel.
Since:
next

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final Setting<Boolean>
    AUTO_JOIN
    If set to true auto joins players into the channel when they connect.
    static final Setting<Boolean>
    FORCED
    Forces the player to stay in the channel preventing him from leaving.
    static final Setting<Boolean>
    GLOBAL
    Sets the channel as global, relaying messages to all servers in the network.
    static final Setting<Boolean>
    HIDDEN
    Hides the channel in commands, auto completion and listings.
    static final Setting<String>
    JOIN_PERMISSION
    Sets the permission that is required to join the channel, if the channel is protected.
    static final Setting<Integer>
    PRIORITY
    The priority of the channel may determine the position in the view.
    static final Setting<Boolean>
    PRIVATE
    Marks the channel as a private conversation between two players.
    static final Setting<Boolean>
    PROTECTED
    A protected channel may restrict access to it, by running checks, such as a JOIN_PERMISSION check.

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • PRIORITY

      public static final Setting<Integer> PRIORITY
      The priority of the channel may determine the position in the view.

      The lower the priority value the higher the priority of the channel.

      Default: 100.

    • PROTECTED

      public static final Setting<Boolean> PROTECTED
      A protected channel may restrict access to it, by running checks, such as a JOIN_PERMISSION check.

      Default: false

    • JOIN_PERMISSION

      public static final Setting<String> JOIN_PERMISSION
      Sets the permission that is required to join the channel, if the channel is protected.

      Default: 'schat.admin.channel.join'

    • GLOBAL

      public static final Setting<Boolean> GLOBAL
      Sets the channel as global, relaying messages to all servers in the network.

      Default: true

    • PRIVATE

      public static final Setting<Boolean> PRIVATE
      Marks the channel as a private conversation between two players.

      Default: false

    • HIDDEN

      public static final Setting<Boolean> HIDDEN
      Hides the channel in commands, auto completion and listings.

      Default: false

    • AUTO_JOIN

      public static final Setting<Boolean> AUTO_JOIN
      If set to true auto joins players into the channel when they connect.

      Default: false

    • FORCED

      public static final Setting<Boolean> FORCED
      Forces the player to stay in the channel preventing him from leaving.

      Default: false
